 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new rectangular hotspot and attaches it to a VR panorama.
 19  *
 20  * @class A rectangular VR panorama hotspot.
 21  *
 22  * A rectangular hotspot is simply an HTML element that is moved / resized / hidden etc.
 23  * to overlay a given rectangle in the panorama. The element is moved
 24  * by setting its <code>style.top</code> and <code>style.left</code>
 25  * values, and resized by setting its <code>style.width</code> and <code>style.height</code>
 26  * values.
 27  *
 28  * @augments bigshot.VRHotspot
 29  * @param {bigshot.VRPanorama} panorama the panorama to attach this hotspot to
 30  * @param {number} yaw0 the yaw coordinate of the top-left corner of the hotspot
 31  * @param {number} pitch0 the pitch coordinate of the top-left corner of the hotspot
 32  * @param {number} yaw1 the yaw coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the hotspot
 33  * @param {number} pitch1 the pitch coordinate of the bottom-right corner of the hotspot
 34  * @param {HTMLElement} element the HTML element
 35  */
 36 bigshot.VRRectangleHotspot = function (panorama, yaw0, pitch0, yaw1, pitch1, element) {
 37     bigshot.VRHotspot.call (this, panorama);
 38     
 39     this.element = element;
 40     this.point0 = this.toVector (yaw0, pitch0);
 41     this.point1 = this.toVector (yaw1, pitch1);
 42 }
 43 
 44 bigshot.VRRectangleHotspot.prototype = {
 45     layout : function () {
 46         var p = this.toScreen (this.point0);
 47         var p1 = this.toScreen (this.point1);
 48         
 49         var visible = false;
 50         if (p != null && p1 != null) {
 51             var cd = {
 52                 x : p.x,
 53                 y : p.y,
 54                 opacity : 1.0,
 55                 w : p1.x - p.x,
 56                 h : p1.y - p.y
 57             };
 58             
 59             if (this.clip (cd)) {
 60                 this.element.style.top = (cd.y) + "px";
 61                 this.element.style.left = (cd.x) + "px";
 62                 this.element.style.width = (cd.w) + "px";
 63                 this.element.style.height = (cd.h) + "px";
 64                 this.element.style.visibility = "inherit";
 65                 visible = true;
 66             }
 67         }
 68         
 69         if (!visible) {
 70             this.element.style.visibility = "hidden";
 71         }
 72     }
 73 }
 74 
 75 bigshot.Object.extend (bigshot.VRRectangleHotspot, bigshot.VRHotspot);
 76 bigshot.Object.validate ("bigshot.VRRectangleHotspot", bigshot.VRHotspot);
 77
